What's wild is that the DOD is running on his impulses. Alcoholism also brings erratic and impulsive behavior. America is so cooked if this regime ever steps down, so much relation building that will forever be at arms distance and the amount of money that will go towards contractors to assess what happened across the entire government in this 4 year period is going to last 2-3 president's at least.

I don’t understand how everything these dudes do materially helps the Russians and our media is all 🤷
Hegseth has seriously cured my imposter syndrome.

posts.title: 84% of the world's coral reefs hit by worst bleaching event on record
top_comments: Anti-intellectualism and corporate oligarchy have to die out or we are done for.
I’m so fucking scared of the future
I read it but I have a question. Is it 84% of all of them are completely bleached, or are 84% affected by some bleaching?

As a scuba diver I’ve seen this first hand. I visited Coron, Philippines in 2014 and 2024, entire reefs had been bleached and killed in just 10 years.

Between the sheer amount of plastic we dump into the oceans and rising temperatures, we are doing our damnedest to kill off marine and coral life as fast as possible.

I grew up within an easy boat ride of the Great Barrier Reef. It was a distinct presence during my childhood and something that I’ve always thought as permanent as the mountains. I can’t take in and process that it’s dying so quickly, it’s like the moon disappearing from the sky.

It’s why they fight to hide it or call it lies, they know what’s happening and know what would happen if they didn’t keep 50% of the population on their side for their crimes. They expect to let everyone die off as they’ve prepped as best they can and continue to prep to survive with the massive wealth transfer
Can we bleach 84% of billionaires?
Fuck SAKE. Every fucking day these cunts are fucking killing us. Can we please fucking do something whatever we are doing is not enough.
Grim. And I doubt we’re going to change anything.
But hey, it's YOUR fault average person!, YOU have to adjust and reduce. Not us!, you! - Corporations

posts.title: FBI has opened 250 investigations tied to violent online network '764' that preys on teens, top official says
top_comments:
> Reflecting what her family described as a typical 764-related encounter, the girl met him on the popular online gaming platform Roblox, and then they began communicating more regularly online, including on Discord, which caters to gamers.
The man convinced her he was her boyfriend, and she sent him sexual photos of herself -- the types of images that 764 adherents threaten to share widely if victims don't comply with their escalating demands.
According to police, she had produced an assortment of 764-related content, including a photo of a nude Barbie doll marked with "764" on its forehead; photos depicting her cutting herself; and a note, written in her blood, calling her supposed boyfriend "a god."
According to her family, the Connecticut girl was trained to hack into Roblox accounts and lock them -- which allowed her to make demands of account owners if they wanted their accounts back. And she allegedly helped direct a series of threats that rattled Vernon-area schools for three months in late 2023 and early last year.

This is so disturbing. If these kids say no, they get threatened or their family gets swatted. Unmonitored internet usage is far more dangerous than so many parents realize. People will find creative and horrible ways to contact kids online.
If they prey on teens and the FBI considers them domestic terrorists, then a presidential pardon shouldn't be far behind.

"Followers of the 764 network share all sorts of violent content with their victims, while some also glorify past mass-casualty attacks such as the 1999 Columbine High School shooting, or introduce victims to other extreme ideologies like neo-Nazism or Satanism, according to authorities."

Oh good, we're doing Satanic Panic again and lumping them in with nazis and mass murderers.
It's a good thing the administration is planning to cut the FBI budget.  As they always say, "Won't you please stop thinking about the children!?".

I've never understood why they don't investigate more about the people calling in the SWAT raids. I'm really unfamiliar with how the process works, but there seem to be way too many stories of raids on regular people's homes without much seeming to be done about the false SWATters.
But dropping the investigation into Vince McMahon where there is ample evidence of his guilt? Gotcha, makes great sense.

>The FBI has more than 250 such investigations currently underway, with every single one of its 55 field offices across the country handling a 764-related case

Well, i guess that's why they haven't been investigating corruption lately.
Why not just a single investigation? Seems pretty inefficient to have 250 simultaneous investigations into the same people.
Investigation probably gonna end when Patel finds out the perps are actually militia members in Trump's ever expanding goon network.

trump's fbi is on the case so we can find out who needs to buy trump bibles or trump coin before the official pardons get printed. big enough donation to the inauguration fund and hell, they might just preemptively silence the witness for ya

posts.title: US Defense Secretary Hegseth to slash senior-most ranks of military
top_comments: This includes removing the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, the Navy's top admiral and other senior flag officers from their positions.
Imagine achieving the highest rank in the military over a lifetime of excellence & devotion ... only to be fired by this chode.
Genuinely troubling. These are the few people most likely to stand up against an unconstitutional order.
You gotta remove the guys who won’t do fascism for you, y’know?
The cleanup after this administration will be monumental and take decades. America is in the process of learning an intensely painful lesson.

For all the noise conservatives make when democratic presidents are in charge, screeching about tyranny... I've never been more afraid of the government than I have been the last four months. And it is getting worse every day.  Something has got to give. The mid terms need to be fucking tidal wave

Edit: yeah, yeah, I get it, "there won't be midterms"... Well what the fuck are you doing, then?  You got a militia I can join? Otherwise, propose a fucking solution. Because I'll be phone banking, donating, knocking on doors and doing the best my household can to democratically pull this shit back.

*"More generals and admirals does not lead to more success," Hegseth said in a video posted on X.*

This is coming from a Fox News weekend TV host - someone with absolutely zero experience to say something like that. 
…

*"This is not a slash and burn exercise meant to punish high ranking officers, nothing could be further from the truth," he said.*

Sooooo, it’s a slash and burn exercise meant to punish high ranking officers.
Yeah, so when they stage the coup for the third term there is no one at the top to defy them.
Getting rid of any military leaders who swore allegiance to the US Constitution, and not Trump before they are deployed to oppress Americans.
I can’t imagine being a general and having this hot dog fire you. After leaking literal war plans in multiple group chats.

posts.title: Russia says all airports in Moscow shut after drone attack
top_comments: Not a good sign for the military parade
Anyone that would fly these dodgy Russian airlines after all the sanctions needs to have their head checked
Job well done. Professionals bring results without bluster; amateurs declare a special military operation.
They got what they wanted. Shouldn't have invaded another country. C***s.

Better to keep those jets ground as many of them are western made running parts that is long overdue to be replaced but can't due to sanction.

Passengers will be inconvenienced but better they are on ground rather than flying.

Shutting down all the airports in Moscow??  Good lord that sounds costly. 

Do it again.  Seriously.  Keep them shuting down, that's as easy way to bankrupt a few airlines.
Are people in Moscow starting to see their lives impacted? I would assume if the people in that city start getting very upset things might start happening?

Hell, our Jetports don't even need drone attacks to be shut down.

We are EXCEPTIONAL!!!

“Oh no!”

Anyway, my nuts itch.
I hope Ukraine strikes the parade!

posts.title: Trump administration bars Harvard from new federal research funding
top_comments:
Yet another thing Harvard can sue him for and win.


Trump is so bad at this villainous consolidation thing.
Trump just showing the way Liberty University can be denied federal funding through their students.

12 Nobel Prize-winning scientists have active research programs at the Harvard Biological Labs.  Trump is attempting to cut off funding to some of the most important and impactful research on the planet, research that has and will save lives and make people's lives better, all because he's in a snit. 

And I say this as someone who did my PhD at a rival institution,  and devoutly believes that Harvard can gargle my testicles.  It's hard to argue with their results.
Just a waste of everyone's resources and time. Fuckwad and his crew have no intentions on actually doing anything that will help the average American
He’s going to decimate America’s leadership in various areas of research over his bruised ego, and the Republican Congress won’t challenge him. This is a team effort.
He's gonna hamstring the brightest minds in the United States from conducting research that may help us all some day? Great.
Fascists doing fascist shit.

I wonder what a great America looks like to Trump. He guts NASA, the greatest space research institution in the world. He guts the NIH, the greatest medical research institution in the world. He guts the CDC, the greatest public health organization in the world. And now he targets Harvard, one of the greatest universities in the world. These are the things that, to me, make America "great."

Does he think a great America is just a place with the most sweat shops in the world? He really seems to prefer America makes brake pads than revolutionary medical breakthroughs.

He’s really not up to speed on what Universities can achieve, is he?

Manchester University isolating Graphene being just one example…
It is *wild* that every day we have another Presidency ending scandal or abuse of power, and yet...there are no conquences for anyone.

posts.title: Germany's Merz falls short of majority in vote for chancellor
top_comments:
I think this shouldn't lead to anything too bad. I assume the no votes come from hardliners in the Union who disliked his debt brake agreement. According to the bundestag website they have 14 days for the second round during which they'll do backroom deals, and even if that fails the third round only requires a plurality not a majority of votes. 

Worst case scenario would be Merz elected by plurality but he is then immediately toppled by a no confidence vote resulting in new elections. However I doubt the Greens or even the Left would do so since polling for the AfD has only increased since early this year.

At least this is my speculation feel free to correct me.

That’s definitely a blow for him, but I think he should meet with the dissidents and understand their reasons and make an agreement. That’s politics and will show if he can make bridges with the adversaries.  At least one more time he should be given the chance to form government.
This was only the first vote! Behold! As there still can be two more. But this has never happened before, so I'm all excited for round two. 😄
Time for back room deals.

He probably shouldn’t have allied him self with the extremist right wing party AfD and he probably shouldn’t kept the last government’s budget short just to abandon all his strong hesitations about the budged once he himself headed toward office…
Starts his tenure with a broken deal. Fitting.

To quite Nelson from The Simpsons :


Haha!
Die Rache von Saskia Esken und Olaf Scholz 😊
Some German MPs could be in Russia's pocket. It's not without precedent.
A clear set up by Trump and Musk, after they declared the Afd an extremist organization.

posts.title: 84% of the world's coral reefs hit by worst bleaching event on record
top_comments: Anti-intellectualism and corporate oligarchy have to die out or we are done for.
I’m so fucking scared of the future
I read it but I have a question. Is it 84% of all of them are completely bleached, or are 84% affected by some bleaching?

As a scuba diver I’ve seen this first hand. I visited Coron, Philippines in 2014 and 2024, entire reefs had been bleached and killed in just 10 years.

Between the sheer amount of plastic we dump into the oceans and rising temperatures, we are doing our damnedest to kill off marine and coral life as fast as possible.

I grew up within an easy boat ride of the Great Barrier Reef. It was a distinct presence during my childhood and something that I’ve always thought as permanent as the mountains. I can’t take in and process that it’s dying so quickly, it’s like the moon disappearing from the sky.

It’s why they fight to hide it or call it lies, they know what’s happening and know what would happen if they didn’t keep 50% of the population on their side for their crimes. They expect to let everyone die off as they’ve prepped as best they can and continue to prep to survive with the massive wealth transfer
Can we bleach 84% of billionaires?
Fuck SAKE. Every fucking day these cunts are fucking killing us. Can we please fucking do something whatever we are doing is not enough.
Grim. And I doubt we’re going to change anything.
But hey, it's YOUR fault average person!, YOU have to adjust and reduce. Not us!, you! - Corporations

posts.title: Germany's Merz falls short of majority in vote for chancellor
top_comments:
I think this shouldn't lead to anything too bad. I assume the no votes come from hardliners in the Union who disliked his debt brake agreement. According to the bundestag website they have 14 days for the second round during which they'll do backroom deals, and even if that fails the third round only requires a plurality not a majority of votes. 

Worst case scenario would be Merz elected by plurality but he is then immediately toppled by a no confidence vote resulting in new elections. However I doubt the Greens or even the Left would do so since polling for the AfD has only increased since early this year.

At least this is my speculation feel free to correct me.

That’s definitely a blow for him, but I think he should meet with the dissidents and understand their reasons and make an agreement. That’s politics and will show if he can make bridges with the adversaries.  At least one more time he should be given the chance to form government.
This was only the first vote! Behold! As there still can be two more. But this has never happened before, so I'm all excited for round two. 😄
Time for back room deals.

He probably shouldn’t have allied him self with the extremist right wing party AfD and he probably shouldn’t kept the last government’s budget short just to abandon all his strong hesitations about the budged once he himself headed toward office…
Starts his tenure with a broken deal. Fitting.

To quite Nelson from The Simpsons :


Haha!
Die Rache von Saskia Esken und Olaf Scholz 😊
Some German MPs could be in Russia's pocket. It's not without precedent.
A clear set up by Trump and Musk, after they declared the Afd an extremist organization.
